summary: BuildRequest specifies no requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff shows multiple functional changes across backend and frontend (settings/theme/logo/admin detection, loading states, retry logic, etc.), which are therefore unrequested relative to the provided BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend data model and storage additions/expansions for videos, settings/adminConfig (including visuals and optional logo), quizzes, quiz results, and user profiles, plus authorization/storage mixins.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest, so these backend feature changes are not traceable to an explicit request.

hallucinated_features.description: Header updated to support displaying an uploaded logo from settings with fallback image, plus responsive mobile menu behavior and conditional admin link display based on loaded admin status.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: App layout introduces a theme-loading spinner state and continues rendering with default theme on error.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query hook useGetSettingsData adds retry logic and query enabling conditions tied to actor availability/fetching state; other hooks invalidate settingsData on mutations.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Theme hook loads theme from backend settings and applies primary/secondary colors to CSS variables.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Multiple additional frontend features described in summaries (admin detection improvements, privacy anonymization, profile setup modal, access denied screen, donation modals, leaderboard, quiz UI, admin editors/managers).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; also these features are not evidenced directly by code diffs here beyond the summarized file list.
